title: Letters in stop motion
content:
Hi everyone,

I just finished a small stop motion animation with letters. Hope you like it.

you can watch here:  
 [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9VS4SsBl9oQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823033207/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=9VS4SsBl9oQ "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9VS4SsBl9oQ")

these guys are Uppercase and Lowercase:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823033207im_/http:/typophile.com/files/uclc_4591.jpg)
author: rui abreu
